title: You
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I don't know what it is, but I know what it ain't, hey
Ain't no flash in the pan, I ain't make no mistake, no, no
I spent too much of my life
Doin' wrong 'til I got it right
I can tell when it's real and I can tell when it's fake
Yeah, that's why
[Chorus]
All I want is you
All I know is all I want is you
All I want is you
All I know is all I want is you
I need you
Cruisin' in the back, black Cadillac
Hands in my lap
All I want is you
All I know is all I want is you, oh
[Verse 2]
I don't need a new house, already got an estate
You the main in the sides, the Michelin on my plate, yeah
Baby, we should go for a ride (We should go for a ride)
I got my eyes on the prize
We can drive slow, ain't got nothing to chase
Woah, what I'm sayin' is

[Chorus]
All I want is you
All I know is all I want is you
All I want is you
All I know is all I want is you
I need you
Cruisin' in the back, black Cadillac
Hands in my lap (Ayy)
All I want is you
All I know is all I want is you (Yeah)
[Bridge]
I don't know too much, but I know what I know
And I know
No matter where I go, whatеver I do
[Chorus]
All I want is you
All I know is all I want is you (Yeah)
All I want is you
All I know is all I want is you
I need you (And I need you now)
Cruisin' in the back, black Cadillac
Hands in my lap
All I want is you (Yеah)
All I know is all I want is you
All I want is you (Yeah)
All I know is all I want is you
All I want is you
All I know is all I want is you
I need you
Cruisin' in the back, black Cadillac
Hands in my lap
All I want is you (Oh, baby)
All I know is all I want is you

[Outro]
I don't know that much
But all I know, I know
I want you
